attributes.action: Invoke Article 50 immediately. People voted. Exit the EU now. It's your duty.
attributes.additional_details: The people of the UK voted in favour of leaving the European Union at the referendum. This should be carried out promptly by invoking Article 50 with immediate effect.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to invoke Article 50 at the European Union giving notice to the EU of our intentions to leave and to start the process forthwith.
